Nesertbus

by Redslash12

Released Nov 23, 2017
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

A NES demake of Desertbus, or at least as close as I can get. NESertBus features the familiar Desert Bus driver seat view but with classic sidescrolling gameplay. Includes Desert Bus staples such as the bus stop, the bug splat, and the unending grind along a straight road with a slight drift to the right.

Screenshots
